scripts.preview: npm run build && echo 'El frontend estÃ¡ listo en /dist para ser servido por NGINX.'
scripts.test: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=testing jest --clearCache && npx cross-env NODE_ENV=testing jest
scripts.test:update:snapshots: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=testing jest --clearCache && npx cross-env NODE_ENV=testing jest -u
scripts.test:watch: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=testing jest --clearCache && npx cross-env NODE_ENV=testing jest --watch
scripts.test:coverage: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=testing jest --clearCache && npx cross-env NODE_ENV=testing jest --coverage --runInBand && node scripts/process-coverage.js
scripts.test:e2e:open: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=testing npm run test:e2e:setup && npx cross-env NODE_ENV=testing cypress open
scripts.test:e2e:prod: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run test:e2e:setup && npx cross-env NODE_ENV=production cypress run && npm run test:e2e:cleanup
scripts.test:e2e:prod:open: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run test:e2e:setup && npx cross-env NODE_ENV=production cypress open
scripts.test:e2e:setup: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=testing node scripts/test-db-prisma.js setup
scripts.test:e2e:cleanup: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=testing node scripts/test-db-prisma.js clean
scripts.test:e2e:reset: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=testing node scripts/test-db-prisma.js reset
scripts.test:e2e:db:create: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=testing node scripts/test-db-prisma.js setup
scripts.test:e2e:db:clean: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=testing node scripts/test-db-prisma.js clean
scripts.test:e2e:db:drop: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=testing node scripts/test-db-prisma.js reset
scripts.docker:build:dev:nocache: npm run env:dev && docker compose -p acamae-frontend -f docker/docker-compose.yml build --no-cache
scripts.docker:build:dev: npm run env:dev && docker compose -p acamae-frontend -f docker/docker-compose.yml build
scripts.docker:up:dev: npm run env:dev && docker compose -p acamae-frontend -f docker/docker-compose.yml up -d
scripts.docker:up:prod: npm run env:prod && docker compose -p acamae-frontend -f docker/docker-compose.prod.yml up -d
scripts.docker:restart: docker compose -p acamae-frontend -f docker/docker-compose.yml restart frontend
scripts.docker:logs: docker compose -p acamae-frontend -f docker/docker-compose.yml logs -f frontend
scripts.docker:reset: docker compose -p acamae-frontend -f docker/docker-compose.yml down -v --rmi all --remove-orphans
scripts.validate: npm run validate:config && npm run validate:workflows
